### Secrets of the Lower East Side
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/92b4bb_bcbf77acb85c42feb098b23ba1201414~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_614,h_480,al_c,lg_1,q_80,enc_avif,quality_auto/92b4bb_bcbf77acb85c42feb098b23ba1201414~mv2.jpg){.rounded .shadow width=100% fig-alt="Black-and-white photo of 1920s Lower East Side"}

*Join us for a tour of the Lower East Side:*  
Explore the hidden speakeasies, historic tenements, and vibrant street art of the Lower East Side. This tour uncovers the neighborhood's immigrant history and underground culture, from the oldest bar in NYC to ghost stories around Eldrich Street.
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Between Two Bridges
![](https://media.timeout.com/images/105683556/1920/1080/image.webp){.rounded .shadow width=100% fig-alt="Panoramic view of Manhattan and Brooklyn bridges"}

*Let's take some Panorama Pictures:*  
A journey through the waterfronts of Manhattan and Brooklyn, from the Manhattan Bridge to the Brooklyn Bridge. Discover industrial relics, scenic parks, and hidden eateries. We'll take amazing shots of Manhattan from Brooklyn before taking a Ferry to the Financial District to explore the beginnings of New Amsterdam.
:::
:::

::: {.grid}
::: {.g-col-6}
### Astoria Food Tour
![](https://external-content.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=https%3A%2F%2Fres.cloudinary.com%2Fthe-infatuation%2Fimage%2Fupload%2Fc_scale%2Cw_1200%2Cq_auto%2Cf_auto%2Fcms%2Freviews%2Fcomfortland%2Fbanners%2F1636651178.5348005&f=1&nofb=1&ipt=42f3aa7a0a70990847d282cd4b35be5e8c433137927439f7d70b3d35a2896ca3){.rounded .shadow width=100% fig-alt="Astoria's diverse food market scene"}

*Let's bring you to the Greek..and the Italian...and the Egyptian... oh and the German too:*  
Leave Manhattan behind and dive into Queens' culinary capital Astoria. Sample Greek souvlaki, Egyptian kebabs, and Balkan pastries. Includes visits to family-run delis and bustling food markets.
:::

::: {.g-col-6}
### Hell's Kitchen
![](https://external-content.duckduckgo.com/iu/?u=https%3A%2F%2Flive.staticflickr.com%2F3850%2F14411837934_48a80b6200_b.jpg&f=1&nofb=1&ipt=b72518ff5ac249fd0d0fc58686e30e690fc0859aeaff533efdd0c5affca609a6){.rounded .shadow width=100% fig-alt="Hell's Kitchen restaurant scene"}

*Let's get some food from around the world, right here in the heart of Manhattan:*  
From mobster hangouts to Broadway theaters, Hell's Kitchen blends grit and glamour. Taste iconic NYC foods while hearing stories of its notorious past.
:::
:::
